title: Course Blog Intro
description: A short post about the course blog for MATH 463 Topics in Biomathematics.
contents:
In addition to the other components of the Topics in Biomathematics
website, one can find links to a series of short blog posts. The
goal of these posts is to share small bits of information that come up
over the span of teaching MATH 463 (beginning in Spring 2022). For
example, the posts may include helpful pointers to further information
on topics discussed in the class, or may even contain short
presentations of material that is slightly beyond the official content
of the course.
